author:
Stephen Whyno and John Wawrow                                                    
                            AP
title: NHL extends self-quarantine mandate for players and staff
description: The NHL is extending its recommendation for players and staff to self-isolate and stay away from team facilities during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The NHL is extending its recommendation for players and staff to self-isolate and stay away from team facilities during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
Deputy commissioner Bill Daly on Tuesday confirmed the NHL has asked that players and staff extend their… [+1398 chars]
